white_house_1.name: Kitchen
white_house_1.description: You step into the warm and inviting kitchen, the scent of freshly baked cookies wafting through the air. The sunlight streaming through the windows highlights the gleaming stainless steel appliances and the rich wood tones of the cabinets. A large island in the center of the room beckons you to sit and stay a while.

objects.name: table
objects.description: A beautiful wooden table with a vase of fresh flowers.

objects.name: drawer
objects.description: A drawer with a small lock, adorned with intricate carvings.

contents.name: key
contents.description: A small, shiny key that looks like it might unlock a treasure chest.

white_house_1.name: Grand Hallway
white_house_1.description: You enter the grand hallway, the soaring ceiling and sweeping staircase making you feel like you're in a fairytale. The walls are adorned with elegant portraits and the floor is made of rich, dark wood. A beautiful chandelier hangs from the ceiling, casting a warm and welcoming glow over the entire space.

objects.name: portrait
objects.description: A stunning portrait of a famous person, painted in vivid colors.

objects.name: chest
objects.description: A large, ornate chest with a complex lock, adorned with intricate carvings.

contents.name: gold coin
contents.description: A shiny gold coin that looks like it might be worth a fortune.

white_house_1.name: Living Room
white_house_1.description: You step into the cozy living room, the plush furniture and soft lighting making you feel like you're in a warm hug. The walls are painted a soothing color and the floor is covered in a soft, plush carpet. A large stone fireplace dominates one wall, and the room is filled with the comforting scent of wood smoke.

objects.name: couch
objects.description: A comfortable, plush couch that looks like it might be the perfect place to take a nap.

objects.name: bookshelf
objects.description: A tall, wooden bookshelf filled with books of all shapes and sizes.

contents.name: book
contents.description: A book about history, filled with fascinating stories and anecdotes.

white_house_1.name: Garden
white_house_1.description: You step out into the beautiful garden, the warm sunshine and fresh air enveloping you like a warm blanket. The garden is filled with vibrant flowers and lush greenery, and the sound of birdsong fills the air. A meandering path leads you through the garden, past a tranquil pond and under a picturesque arbor.

objects.name: bench
objects.description: A beautiful, wooden bench that looks like it might be the perfect place to sit and relax.

objects.name: flower pot
objects.description: A pot filled with vibrant, colorful flowers that look like they might be blooming just for you.

contents.name: flower
contents.description: A beautiful, delicate flower that looks like it might be the perfect addition to any bouquet.

white_house_1.name: Northern Area
white_house_1.description: You enter the northern area, the air crisp and cool. The sky above is a brilliant blue, and the trees are adorned with a dusting of snow. A frozen pond glimmers in the distance, and the sound of snow crunching underfoot fills the air.

objects.name: tree
objects.description: A tall, majestic tree that looks like it might be the perfect place to build a treehouse.

objects.name: rock
objects.description: A large, granite rock that looks like it might be the perfect place to sit and take in the view.

contents.name: mineral
contents.description: A valuable mineral that looks like it might be worth a fortune.

white_house_1.name: Southern Area
white_house_1.description: You enter the southern area, the air warm and balmy. The sky above is a brilliant blue, and the trees are adorned with vibrant green leaves. A tranquil lake glimmers in the distance, and the sound of birdsong fills the air.

objects.name: palm tree
objects.description: A tall, majestic palm tree that looks like it might be the perfect place to build a treehouse.

objects.name: sand
objects.description: A soft, golden sand that looks like it might be the perfect place to build a sandcastle.

contents.name: shell
contents.description: A beautiful, delicate shell that looks like it might be the perfect addition to any collection.

white_house_1.name: Eastern Area
white_house_1.description: You enter the eastern area, the air filled with the scent of exotic spices. The sky above is a brilliant blue, and the trees are adorned with vibrant flowers. A bustling marketplace fills the air with the sounds of merchants hawking their wares.

objects.name: market stall
objects.description: A colorful market stall filled with exotic goods and treasures.

contents.name: spice
contents.description: A fragrant spice that looks like it might be the perfect addition to any dish.

objects.name: vendor
objects.description: A friendly vendor who looks like they might be willing to make a deal.

white_house_1.name: Western Area
white_house_1.description: You enter the western area, the air filled with the scent of saltwater and seaweed. The sky above is a brilliant blue, and the trees are adorned with seagulls. A rugged coastline stretches out before you, the sound of waves crashing against the shore filling the air.

objects.name: lighthouse
objects.description: A tall, majestic lighthouse that looks like it might be the perfect place to get a great view.

objects.name: rocky shore
objects.description: A rugged, rocky shoreline that looks like it might be the perfect place to explore.

contents.name: shell
contents.description: A beautiful, delicate shell that looks like it might be the perfect addition to any collection.

contents.name: pebble
contents.description: A small, smooth pebble that looks like it might be the perfect souvenir.
